com.siperian.bdd.userexits.operations

Interface IHMUserOperationPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IBaseOperationPlugin

    public interface IHMUserOperationPlugin
extends IBaseOperationPlugin

    Defines the user exits for the User operations under HM graph.

    Interface for the user operation (OperationType.HM_USER_DEFINED_OPERATION). Implementations of this interface plug in to "More Actions" menu of the "Hierarchy View" screen of the BDD.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HMOperationResult processOperation(BDDHMGraph wholeGraph, BDDHMGraph selection)
      Called when the user selects an action from "More actions" menu.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.siperian.bdd.userexits.operations.IBaseOperationPlugin

        getOperationContext, getOperationType

    • Method Detail

      • processOperation

        HMOperationResult processOperation(BDDHMGraph wholeGraph,
                                   BDDHMGraph selection)

        Called when the user selects an action from "More actions" menu.

        If logic implemented in this operation was successfully executed, the operation should return a reference to OperationResult.OK. To indicate problems of execution OperationResult can return messages of the following types:

        • OperationExecutionErrorType.ERROR
        • OperationExecutionErrorType.WARNING
        Note:Multiple instance of OperationExecutionErrorType.ERROR or OperationExecutionErrorType.WARNING can be returned through OperatoinResult. They will be displayed all together in a single message dialog.
        Parameters:
        wholeGraph - object representing graph opened on "Hierarchy View" screen
        selection - object representing currently selected graph objects
        Returns:
        result of operation execution.
        See Also:
        HMOperationResult, BDDHMGraph
